Armageddon Orb.name: 末日法球 Armageddon Orb
Armageddon Orb.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:48|name:Imbue Thieves' Tools|traits:action:disable-a-device] (传奇)在盗贼工具上注入代表阿斯莫蒂斯和塞恩蕾的形象，并用它们持续吸取法球的能量，持续10分钟以上。尝试此检定的角色每轮受到5点火焰伤害，直到法球能量耗尽为止。
Armageddon Orb.hazarddescription: 一个旋转的红色法球，由洛瓦古格（Rovagug）的血液锻造而成，当满足一定条件时会从天空降下火焰。

Burn It All.name: 烧尽一切 Burn It All
Burn It All.description:
触发 由陷阱主人所设置的特殊条件；比如说当陷阱主人死亡时；

效果 周围半径100英里的土地降下火雨，对所有生物和物品造成@Damage[10d6[fire]]伤害。每个生物或物品都可以尝试进行@Check[reflex|dc:46|basic]豁免。任何生命值减少为0的生物立即死亡。此效果不足以完全烧毁整座深林、夷平整座山或城市，但通常能杀死该地区绝大部分生物。

Armageddon Orb.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:48|name:Imbue Thieves' Tools|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to imbue a thieves' toolkit with aspects representing Asmodeus and Sarenrae and use them to drain away the orb's power over 10 minutes; the character attempting this check takes @Damage[5[fire]] damage each round until the orb is depleted

Banshee's Symphony.name: 女妖交响 Banshee's Symphony
Banshee's Symphony.hazarddisable: 在陷阱启动之前，通过@Check[thievery|dc:42|name:Pierce Larynx|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)精准地刺穿隐形的喉咙，魔法会像涓涓细流那样被释放出来。当陷阱被激活时，通过三次@Check[thievery|dc:44|name:Deconstruct Larynx|traits:action:disable-a-device] (传奇)把喉咙拆解来拆解咒语。或在陷阱启动前反制女妖之嚎，法术 DC38（9环）。
Banshee's Symphony.hazarddescription: 一阵具有魔法传染性的女妖之嚎法术被困在一个隐形的木乃伊精灵的喉咙里。
Banshee's Symphony.hazardreset: 当陷阱无法再让任何生物嚎叫时，陷阱会关闭（通常是因为在上一轮中没有生物豁免失败，或所有生物都在之前的豁免中投出过大成功）。24小时候陷阱会重置，并准备从木乃伊的喉咙中发出新的嚎叫。
Banshee's Symphony.hazardroutine: （1个动作）陷阱用它的动作强迫一个在上一轮对女妖之嚎豁免失败的随机生物，发出与第一轮女妖之嚎数据相同的女妖之嚎。无论它距离陷阱有多远，即使它已经死了或无法说话，也会发出哀嚎。和法术版本的女妖之嚎不同的是，该陷阱的女妖之嚎可以累加目标的流失状态值。在任何一次豁免中大成功的生物在之后的回合中依然会被陷阱影响，但不能成为陷阱强迫嚎叫的目标。

Scream.name: 尖叫 Scream
Scream.description:
触发 3个或更多的生物在陷阱100尺范围内停留超过6秒；

效果 陷阱释放奥术法术女妖之嚎（DC40），范围为100尺半径弥散范围，而非原来的40尺，影响范围内的所有生物，之后陷阱进行先攻检定。

Banshee's Symphony.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:42|name:Pierce Larynx|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to pierce the invisible larynx so precisely that the magic releases in a trickle before the trap activates, @Check[thievery|dc:44|name:Deconstruct Larynx|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) three times to deconstruct the larynx while the trap is active in such a way that it tears the spell apart, or spell DC 38 (9th level) to counteract the wail of the banshee before the trap activates
Banshee's Symphony.reset: The trap ends when the trap is unable to make a creature scream (usually because no creature failed its save on the previous turn or because all creatures have critically succeeded in the past). It then resets over 24 hours, as a new scream builds up in the mummified larynx.
Banshee's Symphony.routine: (1 action) The trap uses its action to force one random creature that failed its save against wail of the banshee last turn to emit a wail of the banshee with the same statistics as the initial one. The creature wails even if it is dead or unable to speak, no matter how far away from the trap it is. Unlike a casting of the spell, the drained condition from this trap's wail of the banshee spells increases the targets' drained condition values. A creature that critically succeeds at any of its saves can still be affected by the trap on future rounds, but can't be forced to wail by the trap.

Bloodthirsty Urge.name: 嗜杀冲动 Bloodthirsty Urge
Bloodthirsty Urge.hazarddisable: @Check[religion|dc:29|name:Exorcise Spirit] (大师)来驱邪，或@Check[diplomacy|dc:31|name:Talk Down the Spirit] (专家)让它释怀
Bloodthirsty Urge.hazarddescription: 一件作祟的物品，萦绕着某个恶毒的意识的回响，试图杀死任何靠近的人。

Quietus.name: 偿债 Quietus
Quietus.description:
触发 一个生物走近作祟物品10尺范围内；

效果 作祟控制触发此效果的生物，强迫它攻击自己。目标必须通过@Check[will|dc:29]检定。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标对自己进行一次打击，并且自动命中；同时目标惊惧1。

失败 目标对自己进行一次打击，并且自动命中且重击；同时目标惊惧2。

大失败 目标必须进行一次强韧检定。如果目标成功，则视同为失败的结果。如果目标失败，生命值立即归0并死亡。

Bloodthirsty Urge.disable: @Check[religion|dc:29|name:Exorcise Spirit] (master) to exorcise the spirit or @Check[diplomacy|dc:31|name:Talk Down the Spirit] (expert) to talk it down

Bottomless Pit.name: 无底深坑 Bottomless Pit
Bottomless Pit.hazarddescription: 一个铁活板门覆盖着一个10尺见方的无限深坑。
Bottomless Pit.hazardreset: 该陷阱依然可以让生物无限坠落，但是其活板门必须手动重置再能恢复隐藏状态。
Bottomless Pit.stealthdetails: （活板门被解除或者破坏则为0）或侦测魔法

Infinite Pitfall.name: 无尽坠落 Infinite Pitfall
Infinite Pitfall.description:
触发 一个生物踩上活板门；

效果 触发陷阱的生物一直坠落，并可能永远坠落下去。该生物可以尝试抓住边缘来避免坠落。攀爬或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]的DC为26。坑壁上有许多把手，所以下落的生物每6秒可以尝试一次抓住边缘。如果该生物成功，它可以从那个点开始向上攀爬（虽然攀爬距离可能会很长很长，这取决于他坠落距离有多深）。当生物处于无尽的坠落状态时，它可以在坠落过程中休息甚至准备法术，然而掉下去的物品通常永远也找不回来了。

Bottomless Pit.reset: The trap still causes creatures to fall forever if they fall in, but the trapdoor must be reset manually for the trap to become Hidden again.

Brown Mold.name: 褐霉菌 Brown Mold
Brown Mold.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Remove Brown Mold|traits:environmental,fungus] (受训)安全地移除真菌
Brown Mold.hazarddescription: 这种不起眼的真菌贪婪地吸收着空气中的热量。
Brown Mold.hazardreset: 在扩张后，褐霉菌在1日之内不能再次扩张。

Emit Cold.name: 严寒 Emit Cold
Emit Cold.description: 5尺。褐霉菌对相邻的生物造成@Damage[2d6[cold]]伤害。

Leech Warmth.name: 榨取温度 Leech Warmth
Leech Warmth.description:
触发 褐霉菌5尺范围内有火焰；

效果 褐霉菌向占据空间相邻的每个方格扩张。当它扩张时会对周围吸收更多的热量，对扩张后10尺范围内的生物造成@Damage[(2d6+6)[cold]]{2d6+6寒冷伤害}（@Check[fortitude|dc:18|basic]豁免）。

Brown Mold.disable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Remove Brown Mold|traits:environmental,fungus] (trained) to safely remove the mold
Brown Mold.reset: After expanding, the brown mold can't grow again for 1 day.

Confounding Betrayal.name: 迷之背叛 Confounding Betrayal
Confounding Betrayal.hazarddisable: @Check[deception|dc:28|name:Confound the Haunt] (专家)2次，用你自己的诈术反过来骗过作祟；或@Check[occultism|dc:28|name:Create a Ward Against Influence] (受训)2次，创建一个能对抗作祟精神影响的结界。
Confounding Betrayal.hazarddescription: 盟友似乎脱下了伪装，展现出了作为恶毒怪物的本来面目。
Confounding Betrayal.hazardreset: 所有生物离开该区域1分钟之后，作祟会停止活动，但之后会立即重置。
Confounding Betrayal.hazardroutine:
（1 动作；幻术系, 失能, 异能）作祟持续混淆受害者的感官，并刺激它们对彼此施加暴力。作祟区域内的每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:26]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响并且在1分钟内临时免疫。

成功 生物不受影响。

失败 生物陷入困惑1轮。

大失败 生物陷入困惑1分钟。

Unmask.name: 揭开面具 Unmask
Unmask.description:
触发 两个或更多的生物进入作祟区域；

效果 每个生物都会看到身边生物的形态发生改变，似乎变成了嗜血的魔族或异怪。该区域内的每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:30]豁免。

大成功 生物看穿了幻象，并在1分钟之内对作祟的例行程序临时免疫。

成功 目标不受幻象的影响。

失败 生物相信了幻象是真实的；如果它们受到作祟的例行程序影响而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]，则它们不能在受到伤害时通过纯骰检定来结束困惑状态。

大失败 类似失败，但该生物也会对他人产生挥之不去的怀疑，并且在24小时之内无法从协助反应动作中获益。

Confounding Betrayal.disable: @Check[deception|dc:28|name:Confound the Haunt] (expert) twice to confound the haunt with your own deceptions, or @Check[occultism|dc:28|name:Create a Ward Against Influence] (trained) twice to create a ward against the haunt's mental influence
Confounding Betrayal.reset: The haunt deactivates 1 minute after all creatures leave the area but resets immediately thereafter.
Confounding Betrayal.routine:
(1 action; illusion, incapacitation, occult) The haunt continues to confound victims' senses and inspire them to commit violence against each other. Each creature in the haunt's area must attempt a @Check[will|dc:26] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is confused for 1 minute.

Dance Of Death.name: 死亡之舞 Dance Of Death
Dance Of Death.hazarddisable: @Check[intimidation|dc:42|name:Frighten the Orchestra|traits:action:demoralize] (专家)3次，以吓唬幽灵舞者和幽灵音乐家们，使其从表演现场逃离；@Check[performance|dc:40|name:Disrupt Compulsion] (大师)2次，制造足以扰乱演奏的不谐之音；@Check[religion|dc:42|name:Banish Spirits] (大师)3次，通过祈祷放逐幽灵。
Dance Of Death.hazarddescription: 一个怪诞的管弦乐队迫使所有的听众跳舞，直到精疲力竭为止。
Dance Of Death.hazardreset: 怪诞的管弦乐队花1个小时重新调整它们的幻影乐器，之后准备再次开始演奏。
Dance Of Death.hazardroutine:
（1动作；听觉，惑控系，失能，异能）管弦乐队演奏出喧闹的乐曲，迫使所有能听到它的生物花费动作来跳舞。每轮，生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:37]豁免；该豁免的结果会增减该生物每轮必须花在跳舞上的动作数量。如果该生物每轮需要用来跳舞的动作数量超过了其每轮可用的动作总数，那么该生物将因为速度超过身体能承受的极限而受到10d6伤害（大失败翻倍）。

大成功 生物每轮需要花在跳舞上的动作减少1个。

成功 没有效果。

失败 生物每轮需要花在跳舞上的动作增加1个。

大失败 生物每轮需要花在跳舞上的动作增加2个。

Prelude.name: 序曲 Prelude
Prelude.description:
触发 一个生物接近管弦乐队30尺范围内；

效果 管弦乐队迫使所有能听到它的生物开始跳舞。每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:41]豁免，其效果如下。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]并且无法使用反应动作。此外，它每轮必须花费一个动作来跳舞。跳舞是一个移动动作，允许生物以半速行走。

失败 类似成功，除了生物每轮必须花费两个动作来跳舞。

大失败 类似失败，除了生物每轮必须花费三个动作来跳舞。

Dance Of Death.reset: The eerie orchestra spends an hour retuning its phantasmal instruments, after which it is ready to begin its routine again.
Dance Of Death.disable: @Check[intimidation|dc:42|name:Frighten the Orchestra|traits:action:demoralize] (expert) three times to frighten dancers and spectral musicians alike away from participating in the deadly performance, @Check[performance|dc:40|name:Disrupt Compulsion] (master) twice to produce a tune discordant enough to disrupt the compulsion, or @Check[religion|dc:42|name:Banish Spirits] (master) three times to banish the spirits with prayers
Dance Of Death.routine:
(1 action; auditory, incapacitation, mental, occult) The orchestra performs a raucous tune, compelling all creatures that can hear it to spend actions dancing. Each round, creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:37] save; the results of this save modify the number of actions that the creature must spend dancing each round. If this would cause the creature to spend more actions dancing than it can use on its turn, the creature takes @Damage[10d6] damage (or double that on a critical failure) from moving faster than its body can manage.

Critical Success The creature decreases the number of actions it must spend dancing by 1.

Success No effect.

Failure The creature increases the actions it must spend dancing by 1.

Critical Failure The creature increases the actions it must spend dancing by 2.

Darkside Mirror.name: 黑镜 Darkside Mirror
Darkside Mirror.hazarddisable: 在角色被替换后的10分钟内，通过@Check[thievery|dc:34|name:Retrieve Creature from Other Dimension|traits:action:disable-a-device] (传奇)从另一个维度将他拉回（只有当他们的镜像死亡时才有可能），在所有的镜像副本死亡之后，通过@Check[thievery|dc:39|name:Permanently Disable Mirror|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)永久解除魔境，或通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（7环；反制 DC32）反制魔境1分钟，阻止它产生额外的镜像副本。
Darkside Mirror.hazarddescription: 一面魔境能将某个角色替换为来自另一个维度的邪恶镜像。
Darkside Mirror.hazardreset: 魔镜时刻准备着把生物吸进其他维度。当一个生物被吸进镜子10分钟后，如果它的盟友没有前来解救这个生物，它就会抵达另一个维度，在那里它可能会被捕获或被杀。在镜像维度中，它会被当做是镜像的镜像，所以当被吸收的生物位于那个维度时，那个维度的人也无法摧毁他们那边的魔镜。这些维度属于不同的现实，并非位面，因此像异界传送这样的仪式也无法将它救出。
Darkside Mirror.hazardroutine: （1个动作）镜子将另一个在镜中形成倒影的生物吸进去，并用一个镜像副本代替它。镜像会主动攻击，使用原来生物的数据，但是属于邪恶阵营（只改变随阵营变化而变化的技能）。一个镜像副本可以使用三个动作与魔镜接触并返回它原来的维度并释放它复制的生物，但大多数镜像副本不倾向于这么做。
Darkside Mirror.stealthdetails: (大师)注意到这面镜子并非普通一般镜子。

Reflection of Evil.name: 邪恶镜像 Reflection of Evil
Reflection of Evil.description:
触发 一个非邪恶的生物在镜中形成倒影；

效果 魔镜将该生物吸了进去，然后用它邪恶的镜像副本取而代之（通过@Check[reflex|dc:34]豁免可以防止被吸到镜中），之后魔镜进行先攻检定。

Darkside Mirror.hp: The mirror can't be damaged while any mirror duplicate is alive
Darkside Mirror.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:34|name:Retrieve Creature from Other Dimension|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to retrieve a creature from the other dimension within 10 minutes of the switch (possible only if their mirror duplicate is dead), @Check[thievery|dc:39|name:Permanently Disable Mirror|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to permanently disable the mirror once all mirror duplicates are dead, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th level; counteract DC 32) to counteract the mirror for 1 minute and prevent additional replacements during that time
Darkside Mirror.routine: (1 action) The mirror absorbs another reflected creature into the mirror and replaces it with a mirror duplicate. Mirror duplicates attack on their own initiative, using the same statistics as the original creature, but with an evil alignment (changing only abilities that shift with the alignment change). A mirror duplicate can spend 3 actions in contact with the mirror to return to its original dimension and release the creature it duplicated, but most mirror duplicates prefer not to.
Darkside Mirror.reset: The mirror is always ready to absorb creatures into the other dimension. Ten minutes after a creature is sucked into the mirror, if an ally doesn't rescue the creature with Thievery, it reaches the other dimension, where it might be captured or killed. In the mirror dimension, it counts as a mirror duplicate, so the denizens of the other dimension can't destroy the mirror on their side while the absorbed creature is there. These dimensions are alternate realities, not planes, so even rituals like plane shift can't reach them.

Drowning Pit.name: 溺水坑 Drowning Pit
Drowning Pit.hp: 喷水口HP32 (BT16), 喷水口硬度8
Drowning Pit.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:18] (受训)堵上每个喷水口，@Check[thievery|dc:22] (受训)打开活板门，或者@Check[athletics|dc:22]来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.yMTKMnaYSGtDz4wk]{破拆 Force Open}活板门
Drowning Pit.hazarddescription: 一个活板门覆盖着一个10尺见方，深30尺的坑，底部有5尺深的积水。墙上的四个喷水口与隐藏的水箱相连。每个喷水口在距离坑顶部6寸的位置从不同的墙壁里伸出。
Drowning Pit.hazardreset: 如果活板门被手动复位并且水箱重新注满水，则陷阱可以被重置；它可以在没有排水的情况下进行重置，但这样做会减弱它的效果。
Drowning Pit.hazardroutine: （4个动作）如果陷阱每有一个喷水口被解除，则每回合减少一个动作。在陷阱的每个动作中，出水口都会喷出水流，增加坑底水位5尺。当坑里水位满了之后，陷阱停止使用动作，并且陷阱中的生物开始溺水。
Drowning Pit.stealthdetails: (受训); 或当陷坑打开时注意到下面的喷水口@Check[perception|dc:22|traits:action:seek] (专家)

Pitfall.name: 陷坑 Pitfall
Pitfall.description:
触发 一个生物走上活板门

效果 触发陷阱的生物坠落到坑底并受到坠落伤害，计算坠落距离时由于底部有水所以减少5尺（一般而言是@Damage[12[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage]伤害）。生物可以通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]来避免坠落。活板门随即猛地关上，然后陷阱进行先攻检定。

Drowning Pit.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:18] (trained) to seal each water spout, @Check[thievery|dc:22] (trained) to open the trapdoor, or @Check[athletics|dc:22] to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.yMTKMnaYSGtDz4wk]{Force Open: Athletics} the trapdoor
Drowning Pit.routine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action each turn for each disabled water spout. On each of the trap's actions, a spout pours water, increasing the depth of the water by 5 feet. Once the pit is full of water, the pit stops using actions, but creatures in the pit begin drowning.
Drowning Pit.reset: The trap can be reset if the door is manually reengaged and the water tanks are refilled; it can be reset without draining the pit, but doing so renders the pit less effective.

Electric Latch Rune.name: 电击符文 Electric Latch Rune
Electric Latch Rune.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Scratch Out the Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)可以在电流释放前抹掉符文；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（2环；反制 DC18）可以反制符文
Electric Latch Rune.hazarddescription: 印在门闩上的隐形符文释放出了强大的电流。

Electrocution.name: 放电 Electrocution
Electrocution.description:
触发 一个生物直接握住，或以工具触碰门闩；

效果 陷阱对目标造成@Damage[3d12[electricity]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:22|basic]豁免）。

Electric Latch Rune.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Scratch Out the Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to scratch out the rune without allowing electricity to flow, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (2nd rank; counteract DC 18) to counteract the rune

Eternal Flame.name: 永恒烈焰 Eternal Flame
Eternal Flame.hazarddisable: @Check[diplomacy|dc:27|name:Calm the Spirit's Rage] (专家)以暂时平息三个灵魂之一的愤怒；@Check[religion|dc:30|name:Exorcise Spirit] (受训)以超度其中一个灵魂；总共需要3次成功才能解除作祟。
Eternal Flame.hazarddescription: 一团狂暴的幽灵火焰凭空升起，强化其区域内的所有不死生物。该作祟通常发生于三具被烧焦的尸体上，它们无论是在一次可怕的事故中丧生，还是在一次蓄意的处刑中殒命，其未能复仇的灵魂因为愤怒而熊熊燃烧。
Eternal Flame.hazardreset: 所有活物都离开作祟区域1分钟后火焰停止，但1小时后，作祟的愤怒和痛苦会慢慢重燃，准备再次触发。
Eternal Flame.hazardroutine: （1动作）幻影火焰在作祟区域肆虐，对区域内的每个生物造成4d6点火焰伤害（@Check[will|dc:23|basic]豁免）。该区域内的不死生物会在下一轮被灌注火焰能量。他们获得“火”特征和火焰免疫，他们的所有攻击造成额外1d6火焰伤害。该区域内的物品不受影响。)

Searing Agony.name: 灼热痛苦 Searing Agony
Searing Agony.description:
触发 一个活着的生物接近最初火灾的受害者遗骸10尺范围内

效果 火灾受害者的痛苦回忆冲击触发生物的心灵。生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:25]豁免，然后作祟进行先攻检定。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}，只要它位于作祟区域内，就会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]，并在离开区域后额外持续3轮。

Eternal Flame.disable: @Check[diplomacy|dc:27|name:Calm the Spirit's Rage] (expert) to temporarily calm the rage of one of the three spirits, or @Check[religion|dc:30|name:Exorcise Spirit] (trained) to exorcise one of the spirits; three total successes are required to disable the haunt
Eternal Flame.routine: (1 action) Phantom flames rage across the haunted area, dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage to each living creature within the area (@Check[will|dc:23|basic] save). Undead creatures in the area are infused with flames for the following round. They gain the fire trait and immunity to fire, and all their attacks deal an additional @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage. Objects in the area are unaffected.
Eternal Flame.reset: The flames cease 1 minute after all living creatures leave the area, but after 1 hour, the anger and pain simmer up and the haunt is ready to trigger again.

Fireball Rune.name: 火球符文 Fireball Rune
Fireball Rune.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Erase the Rune] (专家)可以在触发传感器之前抹除符文，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（3环；反制 DC20）可以反制符文
Fireball Rune.hazarddescription: 一个隐形的符文创造出一个隐形的、探测半径20尺的法球形的魔法传感器。

Fireball.name: 火球 Fireball
Fireball.description:
触发 一个活着的生物进入传感器范围；

效果 符文向该生物所处的方格中心发射火球并引爆。这等同于一个3环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}，造成@Damage[6d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:22|basic]豁免）。

Fireball Rune.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Erase the Rune] (expert) to erase the rune without triggering the sensor, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (3rd rank; counteract DC 20) to counteract the rune

Flensing Blades.name: 旋刃风暴 Flensing Blades
Flensing Blades.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:35|name:Adjust Blades|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)精密地调整刀刃的角度以让它们互相摧毁；@Check[religion|dc:38|name:Weaken the Haunt] (专家)以削弱作祟；总计成功4次才能完全解除。
Flensing Blades.hazarddescription: 仿佛被鬼魂驱使的玻璃和钢铁碎片组成的旋风将路径上接触到的所有东西都切成渣。
Flensing Blades.hazardreset: 一小时后，作祟将锯齿状的碎片拉回其初始区域，之后它可以再次被触发。
Flensing Blades.hazardroutine:
（3动作）刀刃旋风花费3个动作移动，每个动作最多移动30尺，并造成2d10+10挥砍伤害。其路径上的每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:33]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到一半伤害。

失败 生物受到全伤害外加@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d10.success]。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害和@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d10.success]。它同时陷入受伤1（如果已经受伤，则状态值+1）。

每次成功解除危害的尝试都能减少作祟30尺移动速度，而第四次成功的尝试将完全解除作祟。

Whirling Blades.name: 旋风之刃 Whirling Blades
Whirling Blades.description:
触发 三个或更多的生物进入作祟范围；

效果 尖锐的碎片从地面升起，开始飞速旋转，并且占据一个5尺方格。然后作祟进行先攻检定。

Flensing Blades.reset: The haunt draws jagged shards back into its area over the course of an hour, after which it can trigger again.
Flensing Blades.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:35|name:Adjust Blades|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to precisely adjust the blades so that they destroy each other, or @Check[religion|dc:38|name:Weaken the Haunt] (expert) to weaken the haunt; four successes are required to disable it
Flensing Blades.routine:
(3 actions) The tornado of blades uses 3 actions to move, traveling up to 30 feet with each action and dealing @Damage[(2d10+10)[slashing]] damage. Each creature in its path must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:33].

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage plus @Damage[1d10[bleed]].

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and @Damage[1d10[bleed]]. It also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1} (or increases its wounded value by 1, if it is already wounded).

Each successful check to disable this hazard reduces the haunt's movement by 30 feet, and the fourth success disables it completely.

Frozen Moment.name: 瞬间静滞 Frozen Moment
Frozen Moment.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:38|name:Disassemble Spell Components|traits:action:disable-a-device] (传奇)在一眨眼的功夫内迅速瓦解咒语的各个组成部分；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（9环；反制 DC36）在触陷阱出发前反制，或在陷阱触发后反制它对一个生物施加的效果。
Frozen Moment.hazarddescription: 守卫魔法试图将入侵者或窃贼冻结在时间流中。

Adrift in Time.name: 时间漂流 Adrift in Time
Adrift in Time.description:
触发 一个生触碰带有警戒功能的物品或区域；

效果 触发的生物和30尺范围内所有生物被静滞在固定的时间流中（通过@Check[fortitude|dc:38]检定则不受影响）。这些生物的思维运转速度很快，以至于每一轮似乎都过了一个世纪那么久，但是他们的身体和魔法能量移动的非常慢，以至于它们除了回忆知识以为不能进行任何动作。受影响的生物必须立即对心灵扭曲法术进行@Check[will|dc:36]豁免，并且在该生物被冻结后的每一分钟再次进行豁免。此效果持续时间无限，但是可以被反制。

Frozen Moment.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:38|name:Disassemble Spell Components|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to rapidly disassemble the spell's myriad components in a single blink of an eye; or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 36) to counteract the trap before it triggers or to counteract the effect on one creature after the trap is triggered

Ghostly Choir.name: 鬼灵唱诗班 Ghostly Choir
Ghostly Choir.hazarddisable: @Check[performance|dc:28|name:Sing a Different Tune|traits:haunt] (受训)打乱曲子的和声；@Check[religion|dc:28|name:Ritually Silence the Haunt|traits:haunt] (受训)让鬼魂安静下来
Ghostly Choir.hazarddescription: 一群迷失的灵魂从地板中升起，唱着毛骨悚然的颂歌，惊吓听众，用音波墙来冲击他们的身体。

Profane Chant.name: 亵渎颂歌 Profane Chant
Profane Chant.description:
触发 一个生物走进幽灵唱诗班升起的地板的10尺之内；

效果 幽灵唱诗班升起，它的歌声对幽灵形态30尺内的活物造成@Damage[(4d8+18)[mental]]伤害。受影响的生物每次都要尝试一次@Check[will|dc:24|traits:damaging-effect]检定。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到一半伤害并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物受到全伤害并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害，同时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]1轮。

Ghostly Choir.disable: @Check[performance|dc:28|name:Sing a Different Tune|traits:haunt] (trained) to disrupt the song's resonance with another tune or @Check[religion|dc:28|name:Ritually Silence the Haunt|traits:haunt] (trained) to ritually silence the spirits

Grasp Of The Damned.name: 诅咒之握 Grasp Of The Damned
Grasp Of The Damned.hazarddisable: @Check[religion|dc:46|name:Call For Divine Intervention] (大师)激发神祇以干预或反制仪式。
Grasp Of The Damned.hazarddescription: 这些绝望的灵魂是那些以邪恶之神的名义犯下滔天罪行的人的回响。现在，他们只知道自己的灵魂被诅咒了，并且坚定地相信他们可以通过为他们罪大恶极的主人提供巨大的牺牲来改善他们的命运。

Mark for Damnation.name: 诅咒印记 Mark for Damnation
Mark for Damnation.description:
触发 3个或更多13级或更高级别的生物进入作祟区域；

效果 作祟对每个进入作祟区域的生物造成@Damage[(6d12+35)[void]]伤害，并且每个生物都必须尝试@Check[will|dc:40|traits:damaging-effects]检定。

大成功 生物不受伤害，但是陷入毁灭1。

成功 生物受到一半伤害，并且陷入毁灭1。

失败 生物受到满伤害，陷入毁灭2，并且被诅咒标记。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害，陷入毁灭3，并且被诅咒标记。

如果生物在被诅咒标记之后的24小时内死亡，包括作祟的伤害导致的死亡，它的灵魂立即被拖到被诅咒的灵魂所侍奉的邪恶神灵所在的位面，在那里该生物的灵魂被那位神祇其中一位的强大仆从所奴役。只有祈愿和类似的强大效果才能立即恢复失去的灵魂；但是，也可以通过前往邪恶位面并击败灵魂的俘获者来恢复灵魂。

Grasp Of The Damned.disable: @Check[religion|dc:46|name:Call For Divine Intervention] (master) to inspire a deity to intervene and counteract the ritual

Gravehall Trap.name: Gravehall Trap
Gravehall Trap.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:24|name:Disrupt Magical Trigger|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家) to disrupt the magical trigger before the hazard rolls initiative, or @Check[religion|dc:18|name:Overwhelm the Area with Positive Energy] (受训) to overwhelm the area with positive energy and prevent the hazard from using its routine for 1 round; on the third successful Religion check, the necromantic energies are disrupted and the hazard is destroyed.
Gravehall Trap.hazarddescription: When a living creature crosses the midpoint of the trapped tunnel, necromantic magic partially animates the corpses buried in the walls and ceiling.
Gravehall Trap.hazardroutine:
1 Undead fists assail all creatures in the hall, dealing [[/r (4d6)[bludgeoning]]]{4d6钝击伤害}. Creatures in the hall must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:21].

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target takes half damage.

失败 The target takes full damage, and its Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) for 1 round.

大失败 The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} for 1 round.

Lunging Dead.name: Lunging Dead
Lunging Dead.description:
Trigger A living creature crosses the midpoint of the tunnel

Effect The dead reach out from the walls and ceiling, moaning and spewing writhing maggots. Creatures in the room must attempt a @Check[will|dc:21] save. The trap then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}. It can't reduce its frightened condition below 1 while in the trap's area.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Gravehall Trap.routine:
(1 action) Undead fists assail all creatures in the hall, dealing @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]] damage. Creatures in the hall must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:21].

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage, and its Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round.
Gravehall Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:24|name:Disrupt Magical Trigger|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to disrupt the magical trigger before the hazard rolls initiative, or @Check[religion|dc:18|name:Overwhelm the Area with Vitality Energy] (trained) to overwhelm the area with vitality energy and prevent the hazard from using its routine for 1 round; on the third successful Religion check, the necromantic energies are disrupted and the hazard is destroyed.

Green Slime.name: 绿史莱姆 Green Slime
Green Slime.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:33|name:Peel the Slime Off the Ceiling] (专家)从天花板上小心地把史莱姆剥除而不接触它
Green Slime.hazarddescription: 一层腐蚀性的绿色薄膜紧贴着上方的天花板，等待着从下方经过的猎物。
Green Slime.hazardreset: 1小时之后，史莱姆饱餐一顿之后慢慢爬回了天花板。

Dissolving Ambush.name: 溶解伏击 Dissolving Ambush
Dissolving Ambush.description:
触发 一个生物走到史莱姆下方；

效果绿史莱姆落到生物的头顶，试图将其溶解为营养液。目标必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:28]豁免。

大成功 目标从史莱姆下落的路径上跳走，不受影响。

成功 一小部分史莱姆落到了目标身上，目标陷入流失1。

失败 史莱姆落到目标身上，目标陷入流失1 ，并且除非史莱姆被移除，否则它每回合结束时流失状态值都会+1，如果目标已经达到流失4，下一次流失状态值增加时，目标会死亡并且溶解为营养液。复盖目标的史莱姆不能再通过生存检定剥除，并且对史莱姆造成的伤害同样会作用于目标（应用目标的免疫、弱点和抗力而不是绿史莱姆的）。

大失败 绿史莱姆完全覆盖了目标全身。这类似于失败的效果，只是目标立即陷入流失2，并且1轮之后陷入流失4，2轮之后死亡。

Green Slime.disable: @Check[survival|dc:33|name:Peel the Slime Off the Ceiling] (expert) to carefully peel the slime off the ceiling without touching it
Green Slime.reset: 1 hour, as the slime feasts and then slowly creeps back up to the ceiling

Hallucination Powder Trap.name: 致幻粉末陷阱 Hallucination Powder Trap
Hallucination Powder Trap.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:26|name:Disable Hammer|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)可以解除雷管火帽上的击锤
Hallucination Powder Trap.hazarddescription: 一管带有微型炸药的致幻粉末被连接到门把手或类似的门闩上。

Powder Burst.name: 粉末爆发 Powder Burst
Powder Burst.description:
触发 门闩被打开或装粉末的管子破损；

效果 管子爆炸，向@Template[cone|distance:30]范区域洒致幻粉末。锥形区域内的生物必须通过@Check[will|dc:24]检定，否则困惑1轮，并且察觉检定、对影响心灵效果的豁免检定受到-2状态减值，持续[[/gmr 1d4 #hours]]{1d4小时}。如果大失败，则-4。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.6OpwHz0f55wPawHI]

Hallucination Powder Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:26|name:Disable Hammer|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to disable the hammer that strikes the percussion cap

Hammer Of Forbiddance.name: 禁止之锤 Hammer Of Forbiddance
Hammer Of Forbiddance.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:28|name:Prevent Hammer from Swinging|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)一次解除锤子本身，再一次解除锤子的铰链来防止锤子摆动。
Hammer Of Forbiddance.hazarddescription: 一个巨大的锤子在建筑物的入口处摆荡下来，伤害进入此区域的生物，把它推回去并阻止它进一步前进。
Hammer Of Forbiddance.hazardreset: 陷阱会在整个回合结束后重置，暂停1回合后准备再次摆动。

Forbid Entry.name: 禁止进入 Forbid Entry
Forbid Entry.description:
触发 一个生物尝试进入入口；

效果 摆锤挥下，对目标生物进行一次攻击。

strike-Hammer.name: 锤子 Hammer
strike-Hammer.description: 命中时，目标被击退10尺，并且必须通过@Check[will|dc:30]检定，如果失败则24小时内不能进入建筑物内部（如果重击，目标的意志豁免自动失败）；无多重攻击减值。

Hammer Of Forbiddance.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:28|name:Prevent Hammer from Swinging|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) once on the hammer itself and once on its joint to prevent the hammer from swinging
Hammer Of Forbiddance.reset: The trap resets over the course of the round, and is ready to swing again 1 round later.

Hampering Web.name: 捕虫网 Hampering Web
Hampering Web.hazarddescription: 半透明的蛛网覆盖着洞口，准备捕捉小昆虫或阻止较大的生物通过。

Ensnare.name: 诱捕 Ensnare
Ensnare.description:
触发 一个不是蜘蛛的生物走进网中；

效果 蛛网缠绕着触发生物的身体，捆住它的四肢。触发生物必须通过@Check[reflex|dc:20]豁免，否则速度会受到-10环境减值，直到它成功@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]蛛网的束缚（DC20）。如果大失败，蛛网还会黏在生物的脸上，让它陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，并且除非它成功逃脱，否则无法降低恶心状态值。

Hidden Pit.name: 陷坑 Hidden Pit
Hidden Pit.hazarddescription: 木制的活板门覆盖着一个10尺见方，20尺深的坑。
Hidden Pit.hazardreset: 该陷阱依然可以让生物坠落，但是其活板门必须手动重置再能恢复隐藏状态。
Hidden Pit.stealthdetails: （活板门被解除或者破坏则为0）

Pitfall.name: 陷坑 Pitfall
Pitfall.description:
触发 一个生物踩上活板门；

效果 生物坠入陷坑并受到坠落伤害（一般为@Damage[10[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage]伤害）。该生物可以进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]的反应动作来避免坠落。

Hidden Pit.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:12|name:Remove the Trapdoor] to remove the trapdoor
Hidden Pit.reset: Creatures can still fall into the trap, but the trapdoor must be reset manually for the trap to become hidden again.

Insistent Privacy Fence.name: 严守隐私围栏 Insistent Privacy Fence
Insistent Privacy Fence.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:28|name:Disconnect the coil from the fence|traits:electricity,hazard,trap,mechanical] (专家)小心地切断线圈和围栏的电线；或@Check[crafting|dc:30|name:Jury-rig a grounding device|traits:electricity,hazard,trap,mechanical] (大师)安装临时的接地装置来引走电流
Insistent Privacy Fence.hazarddescription: 这段围栏被隐藏的斯塔西亚线圈通着电。
Insistent Privacy Fence.hazardreset: 陷阱失效后将在1分钟之后重置。

Shock.name: 电击 Shock
Shock.description:
触发 一个生物直接触摸栅栏，或用工具或武器触碰栅栏；

效果 栅栏对触发的生物造成[[/r (7d12)[electricity]]]{7d12电击伤害}（@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic|traits:electricity,mechanical,trap,hazard]豁免）。

Insistent Privacy Fence.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:28|name:Disconnect the coil from the fence|traits:electricity,hazard,trap,mechanical] (expert) to carefully disconnect the coil from the fence or @Check[crafting|dc:30|name:Jury-rig a grounding device|traits:electricity,hazard,trap,mechanical] (master) to jury-rig a grounding device to nullify the shock
Insistent Privacy Fence.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 minute.

Jealous Abjurer.name: 嫉妒的护法师 Jealous Abjurer
Jealous Abjurer.hazarddisable: @Check[arcana|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit], @Check[nature|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit], @Check[occultism|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit],或@Check[religion|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit] (大师)让幽灵相信目标掌握的魔法学识浩如烟海。
Jealous Abjurer.hazarddescription: 一个穿着长袍的幽灵从地板上升起，指责般地伸着一根手指。

Rend Magic.name: 撕裂魔法 Rend Magic
Rend Magic.description:
触发 1个受到增益法术效果影响的单位接近护法师30尺范围内；

效果 嫉妒的护法师嫉妒他人的名望和魔法能力，试图将目标身上最高环级的增益法术扭转为灾难性的失败。它尝试一次+26调整值的反制检定。如果反制成功，该法术将被解除，目标将因为法术猛烈地内爆而受到@Damage[(4d12+30)[force]]{4d12+30力场伤害}（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic]豁免）。

Jealous Abjurer.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit], @Check[nature|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit], @Check[occultism|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit], or @Check[religion|dc:36|name:Convince the Spirit] (master) to convince the spirit that the target's magical knowledge is too great to be trifled with

Lava Flume Tube.name: 岩浆管道 Lava Flume Tube
Lava Flume Tube.hp: 摧毁通道闸门（这会使得该通道无法被解除，并阻止陷阱重置）; 地板硬度 18; 地板HP 72 (BT 36)
Lava Flume Tube.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:29|name:Block a Channel|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)堵塞通道，或@Check[thievery|dc:31|name:Release Floor Latch|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)解开活动地板的门闩来逃进下面的房间。
Lava Flume Tube.hazarddescription: 雕刻在石头上的四个闸门孔洞能让岩浆流入一个15尺高的房间；房间地板能缩回，让硬化的熔岩掉落到下面的房间。
Lava Flume Tube.hazardreset: 陷阱在1小时后移开地板，通过将变硬的岩浆（连同里面的生物）倾倒进下面的房间的方式来关闭和重置。生物坠落40尺，并受到坠落伤害（通常是17点钝击伤害）。
Lava Flume Tube.hazardroutine:
（4个动作）陷阱每有一个通道被解除，则每轮失去一个动作。在陷阱的每个动作中，通道都会流出岩浆，对距离通道10尺内的每个生物造成4d6火焰伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:27|basic]豁免）,并且似房间内的岩浆深度上涨1尺（如果所有通道都启动的话则每轮上涨4尺）。

在岩浆里开始回合的生物受到8d6火焰伤害并且禁足直到它从凝固的岩浆中逃脱（DC27）。生物如果被岩浆复盖则会窒息。

上一轮的岩浆在陷阱开始行动时会完全硬化，这会让房间的地板高度升高。一旦房间里充满岩浆，陷阱就会停止行动，但房间里的生物依然会被困住，直到地板打开，陷阱重置。

Flume Activation.name: 管道开启 Flume Activation
Flume Activation.description:
触发 一个生物尝试离开房间；

效果 出口立即封闭，陷阱进行先攻检定。

Lava Flume Tube.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:29|name:Block a Channel|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to block a channel, or @Check[thievery|dc:31|name:Release Floor Latch|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to release the floor latch and escape to the chamber below
Lava Flume Tube.routine:
(4 actions) The trap loses 1 action per disabled channel each turn. On each action, a different channel spews lava, dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage to each creature within 10 feet of the channel (@Check[reflex|dc:27|basic] save), and increasing the depth of the lava in the room by 1 foot (4 feet per round if all the channels are active).

A creature that starts its turn in lava takes @Damage[8d6[fire]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} the hardening lava (DC 27). The creature might suffocate if covered in lava.

Lava from the previous round hardens fully at the start of the trap's turn, effectively raising the floor of the room. Once the room is full of lava, the trap stops taking actions, but creatures in the room remain stuck until the floor opens and the trap resets.
Lava Flume Tube.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 hour by withdrawing the floor, cracking and dumping the hardened lava (and any creatures trapped inside) into the chamber. Creatures fall 40 feet, taking falling damage (typically @Damage[17[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage).

Malevolent Mannequins.name: 怨毒模特 Malevolent Mannequins
Malevolent Mannequins.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:37|name:Jam a mannequin's clockwork mechanisms|traits:clockwork,haunt,mechanical,hazard]{贼活(大师)}阻塞其中一个模特的发条装置；或@Check[religion|dc:35|name:Exorcise a spirit from a mannequin|traits:clockwork,haunt,mechanical,hazard]{宗教(专家)}两次超度其中一个模特身上的幽灵。
Malevolent Mannequins.hazarddescription: 一大群狂暴的幽灵占据了三个发条模特，每一个都会攻击任何胆敢靠近的生物。
Malevolent Mannequins.hazardreset: 作祟失去目标生物后会失效，然后进行重置，这通常需要花费1轮时间，因为模特需要移动回初始地点。如果模特离初始地点超过150尺远，作祟需要更长时间来重置，因为模特每轮只能移动150尺。
Malevolent Mannequins.hazardroutine: （9个动作） 在作祟的每个回合中，每一个模特都能使用3个动作，每有一个模特被解除或摧毁，作祟在每个回合中都失去3个动作。每个模特的都会用第一个动作行走最多50尺远，然后用剩下两个动作进行发条拳打击。每个模特的多重攻击减值都单独计算。

Awaken.name: 唤醒 Awaken
Awaken.description:
触发 一个生物接近到模特30尺范围内；

效果 所有发条模特都蹒跚着走向触发的生物，行走最多50尺远，然后作祟进行先攻检定。

Malevolent Mannequins.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:37|name:Jam a mannequin's clockwork mechanisms|traits:clockwork,haunt,mechanical,hazard]{Thievery (master)} to jam a mannequin's clockwork mechanisms or a @Check[religion|dc:35|name:Exorcise a spirit from a mannequin|traits:clockwork,haunt,mechanical,hazard]{Religion (expert)} twice to exorcise a spirit from a mannequin.
Malevolent Mannequins.routine: (9 actions) Each of the mannequins uses three of the haunt's actions on each turn, and the haunt loses three actions each turn for every disabled or destroyed mannequin. Each mannequin uses its first action to Stride up to 50 feet and its remaining two actions to make clockwork fist Strikes. Each has its own separate multiple attack penalty.
Malevolent Mannequins.reset: The haunt deactivates after it has no target creatures and resets, usually over the course of 1 round, as the mannequins move to their original positions. If a mannequin is more than 150 feet from its original position, the haunt takes longer to reset, as the mannequin moves back 150 feet each round.

Perilous Flash Flood.name: 危险的洪流 Perilous Flash Flood
Perilous Flash Flood.hazarddisable: 3次@Check[athletics|dc:35|name:Move Barricade]、@Check[crafting|dc:35|name:Construct Barricade]或@Check[survival|dc:35|name:Construct Barricade]检定，以移动或建造足够坚固的障碍，在洪水中制造一处避难所。虽然这能创造一个安全的立足之地，但根据洪水的性质和来源，路障后的生物可能仍然处于危险之中。
Perilous Flash Flood.hazarddescription: 无论是裹挟着危险的残骸的洪水冲过街道，还是非自然的物质从容器中爆裂而出，这种无情的洪流会袭击其路径上的一切。
Perilous Flash Flood.hazardroutine:
（1动作）洪水向前推进60英尺，冲击其区域内的所有生物。每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:30]豁免，否则会被洪水冲向下游。造成的伤害的数量和类型取决于洪水的性质，某些类型的洪水会产生额外的效果。湍急的水流意味着洪水区域内的生物必须尝试进行一次@Check[athletics|dc:20|name:Swim|traits:action:swim]检定才能通过游泳动作移动，而那些每轮都未能通过游泳检定的生物会溺水。

大成功 生物不受伤害。

成功 生物受到一般伤害。

失败 生物受到全伤害并被洪水冲走10尺远。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害并被洪水冲走20尺远。

  • 酸液流 Acidic Runoff 这种腐蚀性的洪水在移动时能溶解肉体，造成[[/r (1d12)[bludgeoning]+(1d12+8)[acid]]]{1d12钝击伤害和和1d12+8酸蚀伤害}。此外，它会对强韧豁免大失败的生物造成[[/r (2d6)[persistent,acid]]]{2d6} 持续酸蚀伤害。
  • 高压水波 Battering Waves 这股汹涌的洪水造成@Damage[(2d12+10)[bludgeoning]]{2d12+10钝击伤害}。
  • 恶心的污水 Repulsive Refuse 这股洪流吸收了受污染或携带疾病的物体，例如下水道污水或腐烂的食物。它造成@Damage[(2d12+8)[bludgeoning]]{2d12+8钝击伤害}。每个暴露在洪水中的生物都必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:29]豁免，失败时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，大失败时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。此外，与洪水接触的生物还会暴露在污秽热（@Check[fortitude|dc:20]）的影响下。
  • 尖锐的残骸 Sharp Debris 水里夹杂着各种各样的锋利残骸。洪水造成[[/r (1d12)[bludgeoning]]]{1d12钝击伤害}和@Damage[(1d12+12)[piercing]]{1d12+12穿刺伤害}。
  • 粘液洪流 Sticky Goo 这种物质特别粘。它造成@Damage[(2d12+6)[bludgeoning]]{2d12+6钝击伤害}。此外，洪水中的每个生物必须每轮在它们的回合开始时尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:29]豁免。如果豁免失败，它的所有速度将在1轮内受到–10尺的环境减值。如果大失败，则会被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}1轮。

Burst Free.name: 突然爆发 Burst Free
Burst Free.description:
触发 一个生物或效果打破了洪水的围挡；

效果 随着洪水爆发，危害进行先攻检定。

Filth Fever.name: 污秽热 Filth Fever
Filth Fever.description:
在疾病治愈前，恶心和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]状态不会被移除。

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:20]

阶段1 携带病毒但不发病（[[/gmr 1d4 #hours]]{1d4小时}）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（1天）

阶段3 恶心1，只要恶心还持续着就获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（1天）

阶段4 失去意识（1天）

阶段5 死亡

Perilous Flash Flood.disable: Three @Check[athletics|dc:35|name:Move Barricade], @Check[crafting|dc:35|name:Construct Barricade], or @Check[survival|dc:35|name:Construct Barricade] checks to move or construct barricades strong enough to create a shelter from the flood. While this creates a safe place to stand, creatures outside of the barricaded area may still be in danger depending on the nature and the source of the flood.
Perilous Flash Flood.routine:
(1 action) The flood advances forward 60 feet, crashing into all creatures within its area. Each creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:30] save as the floodwaters pummel them and pull them downstream. The amount and type of damage dealt are based on the nature of the flood, and certain types of floods impose additional effects. The turbulent waters mean creatures within the area of the flood must attempt a @Check[athletics|dc:20|name:Swim|traits:action:swim] check to Swim in order to move, and those who do not succeed at a check to Swim each round may drown.

Critical Success The creature takes no damage.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is moved 10 feet along with the water.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is moved 20 feet along with the water.

  • Acidic Runoff This caustic flood dissolves flesh as it moves, dealing @Damage[1d12[bludgeoning],(1d12+8)[acid]]{1d12 bludgeoning damage and 1d12+8 acid damage}. Additionally, it deals @Damage[2d6[persistent,acid]] damage to creatures who critically fail their Fortitude saves.
  • Battering Waves This flood of rushing water deals @Damage[(2d12+10)[bludgeoning]] damage.
  • Repulsive Refuse This flood has picked up tainted or disease-ridden objects like sewer runoff or rotting food. It deals @Damage[(2d12+8)[bludgeoning]] damage. Each creature exposed to the flood must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:29] save, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a failure or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure. Additionally, creatures who come into contact with the flood waters are exposed to filth fever (@Check[fortitude|dc:20]).
  • Sharp Debris The waters have picked up various objects, some of which are particularly sharp. The flood deals @Damage[1d12[bludgeoning]] damage and @Damage[(1d12+12)[piercing]] damage.
  • Sticky Goo The substance is particularly sticky. It deals @Damage[(2d12+6)[bludgeoning]] damage. Additionally, each creature in the flood must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:29] save at the beginning of their turn each round. On a failed saving throw, they take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all their Speeds for 1 round. On a critical failure, they are instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round.

Pharaoh's Ward.name: 法老之护 Pharaoh's Ward
Pharaoh's Ward.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:27|name:Remove the Lintel] (大师)可以移除门槛上的法术而不触发，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（4环；反制 DC25）反制符文
Pharaoh's Ward.hazarddescription: 诅咒被灌注在入口的门槛上。
Pharaoh's Ward.hazardreset: 当门被关闭之后此陷阱重置。

Curse the Intruders.name: 诅咒闯入者 Curse the Intruders
Curse the Intruders.description:
触发 古墓的封印被人从外面破坏；

效果 任何60尺内活着的生物必须通过@Check[will|dc:23]检定，否则受到法老的诅咒。被诅咒的生物的强韧豁免遭受-2状态减值，并且受到的任何自然或魔法的治疗减半。诅咒会一直持续，直到被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{净化苦难 Cleanse Affliction}或类似的魔法移除。

Pharaoh's Ward.reset: The trap resets when the door is shut.
Pharaoh's Ward.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:27|name:Remove the Lintel] (master) to painstakingly remove the lintel without triggering the magic, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (4th rank; counteract DC 25) to counteract the rune

Planar Rift.name: 位面裂隙 Planar Rift
Planar Rift.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:33|name:Assemble a Rift Seal|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)用牢牢固定在你当前位面上的物品来制作位面封印，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（7环；反制 DC31）反制裂隙
Planar Rift.hazarddescription: 裂缝试图将生物拉到另一位面（由GM指定的特定位面）。

Into the Great Beyond.name: 进入伟大彼岸 Into the Great Beyond
Into the Great Beyond.description:
触发 一个生物靠近裂隙10尺范围内；

效果 触发陷阱的生物连同裂隙30尺内的所有生物被拉进其他位面。每个生物都可以尝试@Check[reflex|dc:33]豁免检定来避免此命运。

Planar Rift.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:33|name:Assemble a Rift Seal|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to assemble a rift seal using objects strongly grounded to your plane, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th rank; counteract DC 31) to counteract the rift

Plummeting Doom.name: 坠落末日 Plummeting Doom
Plummeting Doom.hazarddisable: @Check[athletics|dc:40|name:Forcefully Push Spirits Back] (受训)如此强大的反推力让鬼魂害怕自己反被扔下悬崖；@Check[religion|dc:40|name:Seal the Spirits] (专家)暂时将灵魂禁锢
Plummeting Doom.hazarddescription: 四个复仇的鬼魂抓住闯入者，把他们从附近120英尺高的悬崖边上扔下去。
Plummeting Doom.stealthdetails: (大师)听到远处物体撞击地面的回声

Call of the Ground.name: 大地的召唤 Call of the Ground
Call of the Ground.description:
触发 一个生物接近悬崖边缘15尺范围内；

效果 每个鬼魂尝试把悬崖边缘60尺范围内的生物丢下悬崖，以+26调整值对抗目标的强韧DC。如果作祟成功，目标就会被扔出悬崖边缘，然后坠落到120高的崖底。直到作祟被击败之前，悬崖边缘60尺内的每个生物每次进行阻止坠落、飞行、抓住边缘或其他避免坠落的其他动作时都必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:40]豁免；如果豁免失败，动作将被打断。鬼魂会自动尝试反制任何减缓坠落或减轻坠落效果的法术，例如羽落术，反制调整值+32。

Plummeting Doom.disable: @Check[athletics|dc:40|name:Forcefully Push Spirits Back] (trained) to push back so forcefully that the spirits fear being thrown off the cliff, or @Check[religion|dc:40|name:Seal the Spirits] (expert) to temporarily seal the spirits away

Poisoned Dart Gallery.name: 毒镖走廊 Poisoned Dart Gallery
Poisoned Dart Gallery.hp: 摧毁控制面板并解除陷阱
Poisoned Dart Gallery.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)操作控制面板关闭陷阱
Poisoned Dart Gallery.hazarddescription: 长长的走廊上有无数的洞排成一行，洞里能射出毒镖，走廊尽头有一个隐藏的控制面板。
Poisoned Dart Gallery.hazardreset: 陷阱关闭并在1分钟之后重置。
Poisoned Dart Gallery.hazardroutine: （1个动作）陷阱以一个动作向走廊里的所有生物发射毒镖。由于它持续不断地发射毒镖，陷阱可以在每个生物的回合使用“持续弹幕”自由动作（详见下文）对其发射毒镖。
Poisoned Dart Gallery.stealthdetails: (专家)或@Check[perception|dc:31|traits:action:seek] (大师)注意到控制面板

Dart Volley.name: 飞镖齐射 Dart Volley
Dart Volley.description:
触发 一个生物进入走廊或在走廊里结束回合；

效果 陷阱对触发生物进行一次毒镖打击，然后进行先攻。

strike-Poisoned Dart.name: 毒镖 Poisoned Dart
strike-Poisoned Dart.description: 附加飞镖毒；无多重攻击减值。

Continuous Barrage.name: 持续弹幕 Continuous Barrage
Continuous Barrage.description:
触发 一个生物位于被激活的走廊里，并且完成一个动作；

效果 陷阱对触发生物进行一次毒镖打击。

Flesset Poison.name: 飞镖毒 Flesset Poison
Flesset Poison.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:22]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[3d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3}（1轮）

No MAP.name: No MAP
No MAP.description: The poisoned dart Strikes do not apply a MAP.

Poisoned Dart Gallery.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) on the control panel deactivates the trap.
Poisoned Dart Gallery.routine: (1 action) The trap launches one dart against every creature in the gallery as 1 action. Because it launches darts continuously, the trap can also use the Continuous Barrage free action (see below) to launch darts at each creature during that creature's turn.
Poisoned Dart Gallery.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 minute.

Poisoned Lock.name: 毒锁 Poisoned Lock
Poisoned Lock.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:17|name:Disarm Lock Trap|traits:mechanical,trap] (受训)可以解除弹簧
Poisoned Lock.hazarddescription: 这把锁的钥匙孔附近藏着一根带有弹簧的毒刺。解除或破坏陷阱并不能解除或者破坏这把锁。

Spring.name: 弹簧 Spring
Spring.description:
触发 一个生物尝试开锁；

效果 毒针刺出，攻击该生物。

Cladis Poison.name: 针毒 Cladis Poison
Cladis Poison.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 4小时

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1小时)

阶段2 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1小时)

阶段3 @Damage[3d6[poison]]伤害和流失2 (1小时)

Poisoned Lock.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:17|name:Disarm Lock Trap|traits:mechanical,trap] (trained) on the spring mechanism

Polymorph Trap.name: 变形陷阱 Polymorph Trap
Polymorph Trap.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:32|name:Drain Glyph's Power|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)把刻文的能量无害地释放掉，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（6环；反制 DC30）反制刻文
Polymorph Trap.hazarddescription: 一个德鲁伊刻文，试图把入侵者变成动物。

Baleful Polymorph.name: 恶意变形 Baleful Polymorph
Baleful Polymorph.description:
触发 一个生物进入刻文30尺范围内，但是没有用德鲁伊语说出密语；

效果 该生物被恶意变形术攻击（@Check[will|dc:32]豁免）。

Cursed Metamorphosis.name: Cursed Metamorphosis
Cursed Metamorphosis.description:
Trigger A creature moves within 30 feet of the glyph without speaking the passphrase in Druidic

Effect The creature is targeted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{Cursed Metamorphosis} (@Check[will|dc:32] save).

Polymorph Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:32|name:Drain Glyph's Power|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to drain the glyph's power harmlessly, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (6th rank; counteract DC 30) to counteract the glyph

Quicksand.name: 流沙 Quicksand
Quicksand.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Safely Disturb the Surface] (受训)来扰乱流沙表面
Quicksand.hazarddescription: 一块15尺宽的混合着水和沙子的区域，试图将踏上它的生物吞没。
Quicksand.hazardreset: 流沙依然能吞没任何进入其中的生物，但是表面不再隐蔽，除非它自然沉淀超过24小时。
Quicksand.hazardroutine:
1个动作）流沙主动把里面每个生物都往下拉。一个吞没到腰部的生物背会吞没到脖子，一个被吞没到脖子的生物会被拉到流沙表面以下，必须屏住呼吸来避免窒息。

在流沙中的生物可以尝试@Check[athletics|dc:20|traits:action:swim]检定进行游泳动作，如果它被淹没到脖子或更糟，那么它检定成功可以将自己上浮一级，如果它只被淹没到腰部则检定成功可以移动5尺。如果检定大失败，则下沉一级。

从流沙中游出来的生物能逃离危害范围，并在流沙的相邻方格中处于倒地状态。其他生物可以援助被困的生物，通常是使用绳子或类似的援助，或者救援者尝试进行@Check[athletics|dc:20|name:Aid Another Creature in Quicksand]检定将被困生物拉出，其造成的结果与被困生物自己尝试运动检定的结果相同。
Quicksand.stealthdetails: (受训) （如果流沙表面被扰乱则–10 ，且没有最小熟练度要求）

Submerge.name: 吞没 Submerge
Submerge.description:
触发 一个大型或更小体型的生物走上流沙；

效果 触发的生物腰部以下淹没到流沙中。如果流沙还未投先攻，则进行先攻检定。

Quicksand.disable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Safely Disturb the Surface] (trained) to disturb the surface
Quicksand.reset: The hazard still submerges anyone who walks in, but the surface doesn't become hidden again until it settles over the course of 24 hours.
Quicksand.routine: (1 action) On its initiative, the quicksand pulls down each creature within it. A creature that was submerged up to its waist becomes submerged up to its neck, and a creature that was submerged up to its neck is pulled under and has to hold its breath to avoid suffocation. A creature in the quicksand can attempt a @Check[athletics|dc:20|traits:action:swim] check to Swim to either raise itself by one step if it's submerged to its neck or worse, or to move 5 feet if it's submerged only up to its waist. On a critical failure, the creature is pulled down one step. A creature that Swims out of the quicksand escapes the hazard and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in a space adjacent to the quicksand patch. Other creatures can Aid the creature, typically by using a rope or similar aid, or attempt to pull the creature out with their own @Check[athletics|dc:20|name:Aid Another Creature in Quicksand] check, with the same results as if the creature attempted the check.

Scythe Blades.name: 摆镰 Scythe Blades
Scythe Blades.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Disable a Blade] (受训)解除每一片镰刃。
Scythe Blades.hazarddescription: 两片镰刃，隐藏在15尺长的天花板凹槽里，都与一根绊线相连。

Falling Scythes.name: 摆镰 Falling Scythes
Falling Scythes.description:
触发 绊线被拉动或被切断；

效果 两片镰刃同时向下摆动，每片镰刃都攻击天花板凹槽下的所有生物。

No MAP.name: No MAP
No MAP.description: The Scythe Strikes do not apply a MAP.

Scythe Blades.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Disable a Blade] (trained) to disable each blade

Second Chance.name: 从头再来 Second Chance
Second Chance.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:46|name:Dismantle Spell|traits:action:disable-a-device] (传奇)闭上双眼，从最初的记忆开始有条不紊的回忆每一条鲜活的生活记忆，逐次解开每段咒语。
Second Chance.hazarddescription: 强大的守护魔法被施加在一件物品或一个位置上，能逆转触发者和它盟友们的年龄。

In the Beginning.name: 回到初生 In the Beginning
In the Beginning.description:
触发 一个生物试图窃取物品或入侵该位置。如果生物使用代行者或欺骗手段进行盗窃或入侵，陷阱会准确无误地锁定真正的幕后黑手——无论距离多远，甚至能跨越位面；

效果 触发陷阱的生物和最多五位密谋者立即变回婴儿，失去所有记忆、职业能力和后天受训的技能（通过@Check[fortitude|dc:44]检定则不受影响）。要逆转这种效果几乎是不可能的，需要像@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]这样强大的魔法。

Second Chance.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:46|name:Dismantle Spell|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to take apart the spell one tiny piece at a time, with eyes closed, while recalling every vivid life memory in order, starting from the earliest memory

Shrieker.name: 尖叫蕈 Shrieker
Shrieker.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Disable Air Sac|traits:environmental,fungus]小心地接近它并在不触发尖叫蕈的情况下切断蘑菇的气囊。
Shrieker.hazarddescription: 这个一人大小的紫色蘑菇在受到干扰时发出刺耳的尖叫。

Shriek.name: 尖叫 Shriek
Shriek.description:
触发 一个生物或光源接近尖叫蕈10尺以内，或尖叫蕈受到伤害；

效果 尖叫蕈发出震耳欲聋的尖叫声，对@Template[emanation|distance:30]范围内的生物造成@Damage[1d6[sonic]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:16|basic|traits:auditory]豁免；检定大失败的生物将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]1分钟）。

Shrieker.disable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Disable Air Sac|traits:environmental,fungus] to carefully approach and cut the mushroom's air sac without triggering the shrieker

Slamming Door.name: 瓮中捉鳖 Slamming Door
Slamming Door.hazarddisable: 在石板落下前，通过@Check[thievery|dc:15|name:Disable Floor Panel] (受训)可以解除压力板。
Slamming Door.hazarddescription: 地面的压力地板连接到一块隐藏在走廊天花板上的石板。

Slam Shut.name: 突然落下 Slam Shut
Slam Shut.description:
触发 任何地砖受到压力；

效果 走廊两边的门落下并关闭。石板会对其下方区域或相邻的任何生物造成@Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]]伤害，并将它们按随机方向推离其所在空间。成功通过@Check[reflex|dc:17|traits:damaging-effect]豁免的生物不受伤害，并沿随机方向滚出。如果该生物大成功，它可以选择翻滚的方向。

抬起落下的石板需要进行成功的@Check[athletics|dc:25|name:Lift a Slab Athletics|showDC:all]检定。

命中压力板会触发陷阱，石板与陷阱的AC和豁免相同，但是它拥有硬度 12, HP 48 (BT 24)。

Slamming Door.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:15|name:Disable Floor Panel] (trained) on the floor panels before the slab falls

Snowfall.name: 落雪 Snowfall
Snowfall.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:19|name:Safely Dislodge the Snow] (受训)安全地移开雪堆；或在不触发它的前提下用任何形式的火焰伤害摧毁危害
Snowfall.hazarddescription: 松散的冰雪堆积在较高处，例如树顶或屋顶。它的摩擦力很弱，如果基础发生晃动的话，它很可能会坍塌下去。

Snowdrop.name: 雪崩 Snowdrop
Snowdrop.description:
触发 一个生物在雪堆的下方移动；

效果 冰雪砸在触发的生物身上，造成@Damage[(2d6+3)[bludgeoning]]{2d6+3钝击伤害}（@Check[reflex|dc:18|basic]豁免）并弄湿他们的衣服。除非他们换上干净的衣服，或者在温度正常或更温暖的环境下待上至少1个小时，否则对于他们来说，寒冷环境的严峻程度会增加一级（举例来说，严寒会被视为极寒）。

Snowfall.disable: @Check[survival|dc:19|name:Safely Dislodge the Snow] (trained) to safely dislodge the snow, or deal any amount of fire damage to destroy the hazard without triggering it

Spear Launcher.name: 矛墙 Spear Launcher
Spear Launcher.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Disable Thievery] (受训)可以解除地砖或墙孔
Spear Launcher.hazarddescription: 墙上设有安装了矛的墙孔，它和一块5英尺见方的地砖相连。

Spear.name: 矛 Spear
Spear.description:
触发 地砖受到压力；

效果 矛从墙孔里射出，攻击触发地板的生物或物品。

Spear Launcher.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Disable Thievery] (trained) on the floor tile or wall socket

Spectral Reflection.name: 镜中鬼影 Spectral Reflection
Spectral Reflection.hazarddisable: @Check[religion|dc:23|name:Exorcise Spirit] (受训)驱逐亡魂；@Check[thievery|dc:23|name:Cover the Mirror|traits:action:disable-a-device] (受训)迅速用布把镜子盖上
Spectral Reflection.hazarddescription: 镜子里的倒影微妙地扭曲着，它的表情呈现出一种令人不安的恶意嘲讽。
Spectral Reflection.hazardreset: 鬼影会在1分钟之后重新出现在作祟区域内的任何一面镜子中（详见下文特殊）。

Spectral Impale.name: 幽魂刺击 Spectral Impale
Spectral Impale.description:
触发 一个生物接近镜子15尺范围内，并且镜子被昏暗或明亮光照照亮；

效果 作祟的幽灵进行一次阴影倒钩打击，刺穿生物在镜子中的身体。

Sap Vitality.name: 侵蚀活力 Sap Vitality
Sap Vitality.description: 镜中鬼影试图将被刺穿的生物的一部分生命精华吸进镜子，该生物必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:22]豁免，如果豁免失败，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，大失败时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。

Special.name: 特殊 Special
Special.description: 镜中鬼影常常在整栋建筑里活动，任何足够大的镜子都能让其显现。数据中的生命值和硬度代表了被鬼影强化过的一般镜子；根据你的判断，鬼影可能会显现在更难被摧毁的反射面上。通过破坏反射面能阻止鬼影再次利用它显现。如果该遭遇出现在一个有很多镜面的地方，考虑给与PC通过一般简单危害的双倍甚至三倍的XP。

Spectral Reflection.disable: @Check[religion|dc:23|name:Exorcise Spirit] (trained) to exorcise the spirit, or @Check[thievery|dc:23|name:Cover the Mirror|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to quickly cover the mirror
Spectral Reflection.reset: The haunt re-forms after 1 minute, manifesting in any mirror within its infused area (see Special below).

Spinning Blade Pillar.name: 旋刃柱 Spinning Blade Pillar
Spinning Blade Pillar.hazarddisable: 通过两次@Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Disable Pillar|traits:action:disable-a-device] (受训)来解除柱子，或通过一次@Check[thievery|dc:19|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)来解除控制面板关闭整个陷阱。破坏控制面板会使得陷阱无法通过控制面板关闭，也能让陷阱无法在关闭后自动重置。
Spinning Blade Pillar.hazarddescription: 地板下藏着一根带着三个刀片的金属柱，与周围8块地砖上的触发板相连，30尺内还隐藏着一个控制面板。
Spinning Blade Pillar.hazardreset: 陷阱关闭并在1分钟之后重置。
Spinning Blade Pillar.hazardroutine: （3个动作）旋刃柱首先用第一个动作对所有相邻生物进行一次打击，它的第二个动作是向随机一个方向直线移动（投1d4来决定方向），然后第三个动作是再次用旋刃对所有相邻生物进行一次打击。该陷阱没有多重攻击减值
Spinning Blade Pillar.stealthdetails: (受训)或@Check[perception|dc:26|traits:action:seek] (专家)来察觉控制面板

Rising Pillar.name: 升起旋刃柱 Rising Pillar
Rising Pillar.description:
触发 一个生物踩上任意一块触发板；

效果 旋刃柱突然从网格的交叉点伸出，并立即用旋刃攻击一个相邻的生物（如果有的话），然后陷阱进行先攻检定。

Spinning Blade Pillar.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Disable Pillar|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) twice on the pillar, or @Check[thievery|dc:19|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) once on the control panel deactivates the whole trap. Breaking the control panel prevents anyone from disabling the trap using the control panel and prevents the trap from deactivating automatically.
Spinning Blade Pillar.routine: (3 actions) The trap uses its first action to make a spinning blade Strike against each adjacent creature, its second action to move straight in a random direction (roll [[/gmr 1d4 #Direction]] to determine the direction), and its third to make a spinning blade Strike against each adjacent creature. This trap doesn't take a multiple attack penalty.
Spinning Blade Pillar.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 minute.

Sportlebore.name: 拟餐虫 Sportlebore
Sportlebore.hazarddisable: 一名发现拟餐虫的生物可以使用一个交互动作把它从藏身的食物中剔除。
Sportlebore.hazarddescription: 拟餐虫会藏在一盘食物或一袋干粮内

Mimic Food.name: 拟态食物 Mimic Food
Mimic Food.description:
触发 一名生物食用了拟餐虫藏身其中的食物。

效果 拟餐虫在宿主胃部快速增殖，使得宿主获得拟餐虫感染。

Sportlebore Infestation.name: 拟餐虫感染 Sportlebore Infestation
Sportlebore Infestation.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:22|basic]

阶段1 携带但不发病（1天）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1小时）

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}（1小时）

阶段4 @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:25|basic]豁免），与此同时宿主痛苦地呕吐出一团拟餐虫群并回到阶段 1。

Sportlebore.disable: A creature that notices the sportlebore can remove it from the food it is hidden within automatically as an Interact action.

Steam Vents.name: 蒸汽管道 Steam Vents
Steam Vents.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Disconnect the trip wire|traits:mechanical,trap,hazard]{贼活(受训)}切断绊线；或@Check[crafting|dc:24|name:Reduce the pressure|traits:mechanical,trap,hazard]{手艺(专家)}安全地给管道泄压并避免爆炸
Steam Vents.hazarddescription: 一条绊线连接着加压的大型管道，会向闯入者喷出高温蒸汽。

Steam Blast.name: 蒸汽爆炸 Steam Blast
Steam Blast.description:
触发 绊线被拉动或拉断，一般是由于生物走过绊线所在的方格；

效果 蒸汽从管道里喷出，对15尺内所有生物造成[[/r (3d6)[bludegeoning]]]{3d6钝击伤害}和@Damage[3d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:24|basic|name:Avoid the erupting steam|traits:mechanical,trap,hazard]豁免）。豁免大失败的生物还会被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Steam Vents.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Disconnect the trip wire|traits:mechanical,trap,hazard]{Thievery (trained)} to disconnect the trip wire or a @Check[crafting|dc:24|name:Reduce the pressure|traits:mechanical,trap,hazard]{Crafting (expert)} to carefully reduce the pressure and prevent the blast

Summoning Rune.name: 召唤符文 Summoning Rune
Summoning Rune.hazarddisable: @Check[acrobatics|dc:15|name:Approach Rune]在不触发陷阱的情况下接近陷阱，之后通过@Check[thievery|dc:17|name:Erase Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (受训)来擦除符文，或通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（1环；反制 DC15）来反制符文。
Summoning Rune.hazarddescription: 在一堵隐形的墙或者地板周围半径10尺的范围内有一团无形的魔法传感器，其大小与被召唤的生物相当。

Summon Monster.name: 召唤怪物 Summon Monster
Summon Monster.description:
触发 一个生物进入魔法传感器的范围内；

效果 此陷阱召唤一个特殊的1级生物，具体由陷阱创造时决定。该生物进行先攻检定并持续存在[[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮}，法术效果结束之后该生物消失。如果法术效果结束前有人解除了陷阱则召唤生物也会消失。和大多数召唤的生物不同的是，此陷阱召唤的生物每轮拥有3个动作并且可以使用反应动作。

Summoning Rune.disable: @Check[acrobatics|dc:15|name:Approach Rune] to approach without triggering the trap followed by @Check[thievery|dc:17|name:Erase Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to erase the rune, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (1st rank; counteract DC 15) to counteract the rune
Summoning Rune.reset: The trap resets each day at dawn.

Telekinetic Swarm Trap.name: 念动集群陷阱 Telekinetic Swarm Trap
Telekinetic Swarm Trap.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:27|name:Take Apart Cloud|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)解除每个念动云团，@Check[thievery|dc:32|name:Disable Telekinetic Decoration|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)解除每个念动感应装饰物，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（6环；反制 DC30）反制每个念动感应装饰物。
Telekinetic Swarm Trap.hazarddescription: 三件带有念动感应魔法的无害装饰物把房间内的物体和碎片聚集成旋转的念动云团，攻击房间里所有生物。
Telekinetic Swarm Trap.hazardreset: 如果陷阱没有合适的目标，10分钟之后关闭并重置。（因为目标已经跑得足够远或者全死了）。
Telekinetic Swarm Trap.hazardroutine:
（9个动作）每个念动装饰物每回合都拥有3个动作，每当一个念动装饰物被解除，陷阱每回合就失去3个动作。念动装饰物用它的第一个动作将念动云团移动最多200尺，第二个动作让云团进行打击，第三个动作是吸取更多的物品进入旋转着的云团中，每次增加1d12伤害（最多达到4d12+10）。如果某个装饰物的云团已经达到了最大伤害，那么它的第三个动作什么也不做。

如果云团被破坏，则装饰物会在房间里生成一个新的云团（伤害值为初始状态），然后用它的第二个和第三个动作去移动和攻击。

Agitate.name: 搅动起来 Agitate
Agitate.description:
触发 一个生物呆在房间里至少6秒；

效果 每个念动感应装饰物生成一个由房间内物品组成的云团（总共三个）并且陷阱进行先攻。当陷阱被触发的时候，当时位于房间内的生物成为陷阱的目标，不管它们之后离开房间还是有其他生物之后进入房间。每个念动装饰物能选择不同的生物作为目标。当目标离开陷阱至少1英里时，该生物就不再是目标。此时陷阱会选择一个新目标。

Telekinetic Swarm Trap.reset: The trap deactivates and resets 10 minutes after it has no target creatures (because the creatures either moved too far away or died).
Telekinetic Swarm Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:27|name:Take Apart Cloud|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to take apart a telekinetic cloud, @Check[thievery|dc:32|name:Disable Telekinetic Decoration|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disable each telekinetic decoration, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (6th level; counteract DC 30) to counteract each telekinetic decoration
Telekinetic Swarm Trap.routine:
(9 actions) Each decoration uses 3 of the trap's actions each turn, and the trap loses 3 actions each turn for every decoration that is disabled. A decoration uses its first action to move its cloud of objects up to 200 feet, its second action to make the objects Strike, and its third action to add more objects to the cloud, increasing its damage by 1d12 (to a maximum of 4d12+10). If a decoration's cloud is already at maximum damage, it does nothing with its third action.

If a decoration's cloud has been destroyed, the decoration instead spends its first action to create a new cloud of objects inside the room (using the starting damage value) and then its second and third actions to have the cloud move and attack.

Titanic Flytrap.name: 巨捕蝇草 Titanic Flytrap
Titanic Flytrap.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:22|name:Mislead the Flytrap's Senses] (受训)扰乱捕蝇草感受重量和压力的感官
Titanic Flytrap.hazarddescription: 在水面上看，巨捕蝇草的一部分似乎呈现出普通捕蝇草的样貌，但在浑浊的水下，它隐藏着一副大得多的捕蝇夹，最远触及能达10尺，并且由树枝加固，并布满令人麻痹的鞭毛。
Titanic Flytrap.hazardreset: 1小时（如果捕蝇草饱餐一顿，则重置时间更长）

Snap Shut.name: 猛然咬合 Snap Shut
Snap Shut.description:
触发 一个小型或中型的生物走进隐藏的捕蝇夹的触及范围内

效果 捕蝇草的捕蝇夹猛然咬合，对触发的生物进行一次啃咬打击。

Devour.name: 吞食 Devour
Devour.description: 目标被捕蝇草的啃咬困住，陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]状态，直到它逃脱（DC21）。此外，它还会暴露在夹子内部数百根细小的麻痹鞭毛施放的毒素中。如果捕蝇草的啃咬打击大成功，生物在对抗此毒素时的豁免检定有-2环境减值。被擒抱目标每个回合结束时，都会受到@Damage[3d6[acid]]伤害。

Titanic Flytrap Toxin.name: 巨捕蝇草毒液 Titanic Flytrap Toxin
Titanic Flytrap Toxin.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[3d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]（1轮）

Titanic Flytrap.disable: @Check[survival|dc:22|name:Mislead the Flytrap's Senses] (trained) to mislead the flytrap's sense of weight and pressure
Titanic Flytrap.reset: 1 hour (or longer, after a large meal)

Treacherous Scree.name: 不稳固的碎石 Treacherous Scree
Treacherous Scree.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:20|name:Navigate Safe Path] (受训)找到一条安全路径
Treacherous Scree.hazarddescription: 乍一看，斜坡上方的地面似乎很稳定，但是复盖在上方的小岩石松散地堆积在一起，很容易崩落。

Rockslide.name: 岩崩 Rockslide
Rockslide.description:
触发 一个生物走上不稳定的地表；

效果 岩石崩落导致触发的生物跌倒，并造成@Damage[(2d10+13)[bludgeoning]]{2d10+13钝击伤害}，该生物必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:21|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受伤害。

成功 该生物受到一半的伤害，并且在它占据的空间内倒地。

失败 生物受到全伤害，在它占据的空间内倒地，并且滚落至斜坡下方。

大失败 类似失败，但是造成双倍伤害。

Treacherous Scree.disable: @Check[survival|dc:20|name:Navigate Safe Path] (trained) to navigate a safe path

Vorpal Executioner.name: 斩首处决者 Vorpal Executioner
Vorpal Executioner.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:41|name:Jame Saw Blade|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)堵塞四个不同的滑槽交叉点让锯片没有可行的移动路径，以此阻止它横扫整个房间。
Vorpal Executioner.hazarddescription: 一把锋利的锯片沿着复杂的滑槽向下移动，试图将房间里的每个人斩首。
Vorpal Executioner.hazardreset: 陷阱在运行一整轮之后进行重置，并且在一轮之后可以再次触发。

Total Decapitation.name: 全部斩首 Total Decapitation
Total Decapitation.description:
触发 一个生物尝试离开房间；

效果 锯刃沿着轨道移动，对房间里的所有生物进行一次打击，不断调整它的行进路线和高度来确保尽可能斩首每个目标。

Decapitation.name: 斩首 Decapitation
Decapitation.description: 一旦陷阱造成重击，目标必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect]检定，否则被斩首，立即死亡，除非它没有头部也能活。

No MAP.name: No MAP
No MAP.description: The saw blade Strikes do not apply a MAP.

Vorpal Executioner.reset: The trap resets over the course of the round and can be triggered again 1 round later.
Vorpal Executioner.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:41|name:Jam Saw Blade|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) at four different junctions to jam all the saw blade's possible paths, preventing it from traveling through the room

Web Lurker Deadfall.name: 伏网怪落石陷阱 Web Lurker Deadfall
Web Lurker Deadfall.hazarddisable: 生存（受训）或贼活（专家）DC 20可调整触发陷阱的绳索。
Web Lurker Deadfall.hazarddescription: 一个拌足绳圈使得拦网松脱，导致一堆岩石落到10尺边长方格内的所有目标上。

Deadfall.name: 落石陷阱 Deadfall
Deadfall.description:
触发 有生物进入拌足绳圈所在的方格。

效果 陷阱所在10尺边长方格内的所有生物受到@Damage[2d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:20|basic]豁免）。

Web Lurker Deadfall.disable: Survival (trained) or Thievery (expert) DC 20 to rearrange the webbing.

Web Lurker Noose.name: 伏网怪套索 Web Lurker Noose
Web Lurker Noose.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Rearrange the Webbing|traits:mechanical,trap](受训)或@Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Rearrange the Webbing|traits:mechanical,trap](专家)可调整触发陷阱的绳索。
Web Lurker Noose.hazarddescription: 谨慎摆放在喉咙高度的绳索会在生物走入陷阱时将其套住。

Web Noose.name: 蛛网套索 Web Noose
Web Noose.description:
触发 有生物走入拌足绳圈所在的方格。

效果 伏网怪套索作出套索打击对抗触发陷阱的生物。

strike-Noose.name: 套索 Noose
strike-Noose.description:
命中时造成3d6钝击伤害，目标被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}并拽离地面（@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}DC22）。

只要目标被套索捕捉着，目标就会在其每个回合结束时承受@Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Web Lurker Noose.disable: @Check[survival|dc:18|name:Rearrange the Webbing|traits:mechanical,trap] (trained) or @Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Rearrange the Webbing|traits:mechanical,trap] (expert) to rearrange the webbing.

Wheel Of Misery.name: 神秘之轮 Wheel Of Misery
Wheel Of Misery.hazarddisable: @Check[thievery|dc:26|name:Stop Wheel from Spinning|traits:action:disable-a-device] (专家)阻止轮子飞速转动，@Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Erase Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (大师)擦除上面的每个符文，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（4环；反制 DC22）反制每一个符文。
Wheel Of Misery.hazarddescription: 一个镶嵌在墙上的华丽轮子被分为六个部分，每个部分都绘有彩色符文，它有一个魔法传感器控制，能侦测到前方100尺内的任何生物。
Wheel Of Misery.hazardreset: 如果1分钟之后传感器范围内没有任何生物，则陷阱关闭并重置。
Wheel Of Misery.hazardroutine:
（2个动作）陷阱行动时，首先用第一个动作来旋转，然后停止。投1d6来决定轮子停止时位于最顶端的是哪个部分。然后陷阱使用它的第二个动作施展该部分对应的法术（3环，DC24，法术攻击检定+14）。此法术的目标应为距离其最近的生物，以它为范围法术的中心点，或应复盖到该目标。该陷阱施展的所有法术都是奥术。

1@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{睡眠术 Sleep}

2@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{麻痹术 Paralyze}

3@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt} (100尺直线)

4@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{目盲术 Blindness}

5@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{强酸箭 Acid Arrow}

6@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{衰弱射线 Ray of Enfeeblement}
Wheel Of Misery.stealthdetails: (专家)来侦测到魔法传感器 ；注意到神秘之轮本身的 DC为 0

Wheel Spin.name: 轮转 Wheel Spin
Wheel Spin.description:
触发 一个生物进入传感器的探测范围；

效果 轮子开始行动并进行先攻检定。

Wheel Of Misery.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:26|name:Stop Wheel from Spinning|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) on the wheel to stop it from spinning, @Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Erase Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to erase each rune, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (4th rank; counteract DC 22) to counteract each rune
Wheel Of Misery.reset: The trap deactivates and resets if 1 minute passes without any creature moving within range of its sensor.
Wheel Of Misery.routine:
(2 actions) On its initiative, the trap uses its first action to spin, then stops. Roll 1d6 to determine which segment is topmost when the wheel stops spinning. The wheel uses its second action to replicate the spell listed for that segment (3rd rank, DC 24, spell attack modifier +14). This spell's target is centered on or otherwise includes the nearest creature in the area. This increases the spell's range to 100 feet if necessary. Any spell cast by this trap is arcane.

1@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}

2@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze}

3@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} (100-foot line)

4@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness}

5@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.thAHF1zxNplLCJPO]{Caustic Blast}

6@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{Enfeeble}

Yellow Mold.name: 黄霉菌 Yellow Mold
Yellow Mold.hazarddisable: @Check[survival|dc:26|name:Remove the Mold] (专家)可以移除霉菌而不触发孢子。
Yellow Mold.hazarddescription: 有毒的霉菌孢子攻击附近的生物。

Spore Explosion.name: 孢子爆发 Spore Explosion
Spore Explosion.description:
触发 一个生物移动到霉菌占据的空间或对霉菌造成伤害。如果霉菌被阳光直射，或伤害类型为火焰伤害，则该反应动作不可用；

效果 目标生物和@Template[emanation|distance:10]{10尺}范围内的所有生物都暴露在黄霉菌孢子中。

Yellow Mold Spores.name: 黄霉菌孢子 Yellow Mold Spores
Yellow Mold Spores.description:
孢子造成的任何流失状态都持续到毒素的持续时间结束之后；

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:26]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d8[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[2d8[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[3d8[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3}（1轮）

Yellow Mold.disable: @Check[survival|dc:26|name:Remove the Mold] (expert) to remove the mold without triggering the spores

Poisonous Mold.name: Poisonous Mold
Poisonous Mold.hazarddescription: This grotesque fungus releases poisonous spores when a creature comes near.
Poisonous Mold.reset: Unless entirely eradicated (typically with acid or fire), the mold regrows over the course of 2 weeks.

Feed on Decay.name: Feed on Decay
Feed on Decay.description: The mold expands when fed by blood or decay. If at any point a creature takes bleed damage while adjacent to the mold or a dying or dead body is adjacent to the mold, the mold grows to expand into every square adjacent to its current space. This can happen only once per day.

Spore Burst.name: Spore Burst
Spore Burst.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature touches the mold, hits it, or damages it

Effect The mold explodes in a burst of spores and mold clusters, dealing @Damage[(2d6+6)[poison]] damage to creatures within 10 feet of it, with a @Check[fortitude|dc:18|basic] save.

Floating Spores.name: Floating Spores
Floating Spores.description: 5 feet. A creature that enters or starts its turn in the aura takes @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage.
